name: Animal Hospital
storyline: Rodents, birds, cats, dogs, horses become a real veterinarian and take care of your favorite animals! Dr. Robert's clinic is going through tough times and needs your talents to grow and expand. Exams, diagnoses and treatments, heal your patients and unlock new care centers to accommodate all patients with hair and feathers.
summary: The sick animals need you! Live the dream life of a true veterinarian. Improve and expand your surgery to accommodate more patients. Dogs, cats, horses, birds… they all need your care!
